body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, my name is Roger Ward and I am from Blue Car Auto Sales. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Carol. Could you kindly provide me with your phone number?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's three one zero two five five eight four three six.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you. And could you also share your email address with me?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, it's c dot bennett at example dot com.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great, thank you for sharing that information, Carol. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that's all. I'm feeling relieved now.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I'm glad to hear that. Thank you for your time, Carol. Have a wonderful day.
